Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Social media was abuzz with the recently announced Australian budget with people sharing a variety of opinions. Some applauded the money going towards investments in hydrogen environmental sustainability and supporting businesses. Others criticized the focus on nuclear power and gas-led recovery while some praised the efforts made towards improving health outcomes and providing relief to low-income families. Disagreements over disarmament and political maneuvering were also prominent. Overall the budget was seen as helpful by some but lacking meaningful change for others.
